Posts.Content: Jun 15, 2015 09:25PM - edited Jun 15, 2015 09:30PM by Kat-15 I guess it's time for me to join the party, will have my fist chemo treatment this Friday. I had a port installed today. I will have 8 treatments every two weeks until done. My mom passed away from ovarian cancer last year, she kept her hair all through chemo, I hope I get that lucky, but I doubt it. Chemo combo is four treatment of ac and then 4 of t, 40 rounds of radiation plus 10 years of an estrogen blocker. Good luck and my prayers will be with all of you. Your fellow June sister Kat
Posts.Title: Chemo in June 2015 zzlady Catfurr
